import './main.css'; import React from "react"; import { useState } from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom"; function Menu() { const [selected, select] = useState(1); if(selected==5){ alert(selected); } return (
select(3)}> select(4)}> select(5)}> select(6)}>
); } export default Menu;
